languages.text: The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.
languages.original_text: Детей Азуриана, как культуру, характеризует их следование Пути Азуриани. Это философия, учащая их укреплять разум и держать его в гармонии, а также преследовать конструктивные цели, вместо того, чтобы морально разлагаться и впадать в гедонизм и эгоизм.

traits.locale_text: The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.

The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.

The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.

languages.text: Детей Азуриана, как культуру, характеризует их следование Пути Азуриани. Это философия, учащая их укреплять разум и держать его в гармонии, а также преследовать конструктивные цели, вместо того, чтобы морально разлагаться и впадать в гедонизм и эгоизм.

Die Kinder von Asuryan werden als Kultur durch ihr Streben nach dem Asuryani-Pfad definiert. Diese Philosophie lehrt sie, ihren starken Geist auszubalancieren und konstruktive Ziele anzustreben, anstatt dem amoralischen Streben nach Vergnügen und Egoismus zu verfallen.
languages.original_text: The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.

traits.locale_text: Die Kinder von Asuryan werden als Kultur durch ihr Streben nach dem Asuryani-Pfad definiert. Diese Philosophie lehrt sie, ihren starken Geist auszubalancieren und konstruktive Ziele anzustreben, anstatt dem amoralischen Streben nach Vergnügen und Egoismus zu verfallen.

languages.text: Les Enfants d'Asuryan se considèrent comme une culture en quête de la Voie d'Asuryan. Cette philosophie leur apprend à équilibrer leurs puissants esprits et à tendre vers des objectifs constructifs plutôt que de tomber dans la quête amorale du plaisir et de l'égoïsme.
languages.original_text: The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.

traits.locale_text: Les Enfants d'Asuryan se définissent en tant que culture en raison de leur poursuite de la Voie Asuryani. Cette philosophie leur apprend à équilibrer leurs puissants esprits et à viser des objectifs constructifs plutôt que de tomber dans la poursuite amorale du plaisir et de l'égoïsme.

languages.text: 方舟灵族是居住在方舟世界的艾达灵族，崇尚阿苏焉之子的道途。在这样的哲学理念引导下，方舟灵族会不断学习如何平衡强大的思想，如何为了建设性的目标而奋斗，不会陷入对利益与享乐的邪恶追求。
languages.original_text: The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.

traits.locale_text: 方舟灵族是居住在方舟世界的艾达灵族，崇尚阿苏焉之子的道途。在这样的哲学理念引导下，方舟灵族会不断学习如何平衡强大的思想，如何为了建设性的目标而奋斗，不会陷入对利益与享乐的邪恶追求。

languages.text: アシュリアンの御子は、アシュリヤーニの道を追求することによって文化として定義される。この哲学は、快楽や利己主義の非道徳的な追求に陥るのではなく、潜在的な心のバランスをとり、建設的な目標に向かって努力する方法を教えている。
languages.original_text: The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.

traits.locale_text: アシュリアンの御子は、アシュリヤーニの道を追求することによって文化として定義される。この哲学は、快楽や利己主義の非道徳的な追求に陥るのではなく、潜在的な心のバランスをとり、建設的な目標に向かって努力する方法を教えている。

languages.text: La cultura de los hijos de Asuryan se caracteriza por su dedicación al dogma Asuryani. Esta filosofía les enseña a equilibrar sus poderosas mentes y a luchar por objetivos constructivos, en lugar de caer en la búsqueda amoral del placer y el egoísmo.
languages.original_text: The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.

traits.locale_text: La cultura de los hijos de Asuryan se caracteriza por su dedicación al dogma Asuryani. Esta filosofía les enseña a equilibrar sus poderosas mentes y a luchar por objetivos constructivos, en lugar de caer en la búsqueda amoral del placer y el egoísmo.

languages.text: Asuryan'ın Çocukları, bir kültür olarak Asuryani Yolu'na bağlılıklarıyla karakterize edilirler. Bu felsefe onlara zihni güçlendirerek dengede tutmayı; ahlaki bozulma, hazcılık ve bencilliğe düşmek yerine yapıcı hedefler peşinde koşmayı öğretir.
languages.original_text: The Children of Asuryan are defined as a culture by their pursuit of the Asuryani Path. This philosophy teaches them how to balance their potent minds and strive for constructive goals rather than falling into the amoral pursuit of pleasure and selfishness.
